name: Death in Strange Places
description:
A Puzzle-Platformer where you play as a strange man, trying desperately to escape his demons. But the only way to escape death is to use it.

Wherever you die, a gravestone soon follows. Use this to cross gaps, kill enemies, and solve puzzles as you try to escape your own hell.

Controls:

  • A/D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Escape to pause

Credits:

  • Programming & Art: CodeRed
  • Music: Keegan Clark
